sanskrit: अनन्तविजयं राजा कुन्तीपुत्रो युधिष्ठिरः| नकुलः सहदेवश्च सुघोषमणिपुष्पकौ  || 1.16 ||
Translation: King Yudhishthira, the son of Kunti, blew the Anantavijaya; Nakula and Sahadeva blew the Sughosha and the Manipushpaka.
answer: The names of the conches of Yudhisthira, Nakula, and Sahadeva as mentioned in the Bhagavad Gita are Anantavijaya, Sughosha, and Manipushpaka respectively.
